title: Regal Chalet-Inspired India Escape in the Coorg Jungle
description: With a wealth of natural splendour in its verdant surrounds, Coorg Wilderness Resort & Spa is a serene oasis in the tropical wilderness of the 'Scotland of India'. Relax in opulent rooms designed with European chalet-inspired features, with large bay windows that welcome the gentle winter sun rays, and indulge with a variety of cuisines, a luxe spa and a breathtaking infinity pool.
offer_address: Virajpet Main Road, Mekeri, Madikeri, Karnataka 571201, India
